output.sentences: Boston turned out to support the Red Sox after their World Series win.
A throng of people were there to cheer on Manny Ramirez.
As the parade went down the street, everyone waved at the coaching staff also.
Some people, however, were angry with the organization and gave the team a rude gesture.
Most of the fans though were thrilled to be at this location.
